text:
Hello, everyone!
I'm facing *limitations* with the *calling-extension SDK*, and was wondering how best I could reach out about them? Especially since the Github repo for the SDK closed the ability to report issues (right after I started commenting there :sob:).

The issues I'm facing I've described in these community posts:

• <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Internal-Server-Error-Caused-by-Some-Numbers-in-Calling-SDK/td-p/1077473|Internal Server Error Caused by Some Numbers>
• <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Phone-Number-Extension-Not-Sent-With-Dialled-Number-Data/td-p/1076769|Phone Numbers Sent Without Extension Number>

Hi, <@U07SKR0FZNW>. Do you know how to use pagination in a GET request for a custom object's records? I have a custom object associated with deals, and there are 109 deals, but when I make the GET request, it only returns 100. It provides me with the after for pagination, but I can't use the after ID to fetch the remaining 9 deals. Can you help me?
I'm using the URL like this

since "next" exists,
then grab the value in "link" and make a request to that
keep doing if there is a "next" item

Hi everyone,

I just have a quick question.

Is there an api endpoint for this part of HubSpot ?

In marketing -> Social -> Calendar. Just want to retrieve this to my own calendar ^^. Have a great day all

Hi there, We're creating a custom API to transfer data from our SQL database into HubSpot for marketing purposes. Am I OK to simply create new properties for the data to map to, or do I need to create a custom data object? It's only a single piece of data which is being stored in the field (a time/date stamp) so I'm thinking the custom property should be fine?

Howdy Folks!
I recently added the SMS addon to our HubSpot, and I'm trying to trigger SMS messages via the API - is this possible?

I have a livestreaming website, and users want to subscribe to SMS alerts when a show starts. I have a serverless function that triggers whenever a show starts, but I'm trying to learn how to trigger the SMS when that function fire.
I tried using the webhook-driven workflow, but when I send a `fetch` to the address I was given I get a 415 unspported media type error.

Has anyone done something like this? TIA!

Hi, everyone! new to this slack! needed help from you..

I'm using this endpoint to create an association between two objects `/crm/v3/objects/deals/<id>/associations/companies/<id>/<label>`

it seems that it works when I use a HubSpot label, but it doesn't work when I use a custom label. anyone knows why?

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/api/marketing/forms/v3-legacy#submit-data-to-a-form>

Curious if anyone has used this to re-opt-in a contact thru the API when that contact had previously unsubscribed.
<@U06H94JKK1P> If it helps at all, it looks like the V4 API uses just the "Flow ID": <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/api/automation/create-manage-workflows>
